articles.title: Kim Jong Il Meets Participants of KPISF Activists Meeting
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Meets Participants of KPISF Activists Meeting
Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il met and congratulated the participants in the meeting of activists of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces.
					 When he appeared to have a photo session all the participants enthusiastically welcomed him.
					
					 He warmly congratulated them who have reliably protected the gains of the Korean revolution won at the cost of blood and the people's lives and property, standing at the forefront of class struggle with intense loyalty to the Party and the leader and the spirit of devoted service for the people and had a photo session with them.
					
					 Saying that the socialist country of Juche is impregnable as the heroic KPA which has grown to be a-match-for-a hundred army are firmly standing guard at the defence line of the country and the Internal Security Forces intensely loyal to the Party, the leader, the country and the people are reliably defending the security of the country and the people, he highly praised the servicepersons of the Internal Security Forces for having creditably discharged their honorable mission as the first-line unit devotedly defending the leader and the Internal Security Forces of the Party over the past 60 odd years.
					
					 He expressed great expectation and belief that the servicepersons of the Internal Security Forces would as ever fulfill their duty as executor and defender of the law, bearing deep in their mind the heavy and responsible duty of political defender of the WPK and thus devotedly protect the Korean-style socialist system centered on the popular masses. 
					
					 Accompanying him were Ri Yong Ho, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee and vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK and chief of the General Staff of the KPA, Kim Jong Un, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK, Kim Ki Nam and Choe Thae Bok, members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the WPK Central Committee, Yang Hyong Sop, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Ju Sang Song, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and minister of People's Security, Jang Song Thaek, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-chairman of the NDC, and Ri Pyong Sam, director of the Political Bureau of the KPISF.

articles.title: FM Spokesman Snubs Anti-DPRK "Resolution on Human Rights"
articles.content:
FM Spokesman Snubs Anti-DPRK "Resolution on Human Rights"
Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry Saturday gave the following answer to the question put by KCNA as regards the anti-DPRK "resolution on human rights" adopted at the Third Committee of the 65th UN General Assembly: 
					 EU and Japan railroaded the "resolution" peppered with all sorts of fabrications through the committee this year, too. 
					
					 The "resolution" is a product of the political plot of the hostile forces who have nothing to do with the protection and improvement of human rights.
					
					 The hostile forces led by the U.S. hatch this plot every year to bring down the DPRK's system through pressure and conspiratorial means by labeling it a "human rights abuser".
					
					 As for the year 2003 in which the farce of adopting this kind of "resolution" started, it was the year when the Bush Administration kicked off overall confrontation with the DPRK, overturning the DPRK-U.S. Agreed Framework. It was a typical example of politicizing human rights that EU, which pursued dialogue with the DPRK over human rights, unexpectedly became "a sponsor of the anti-DPRK resolution on human rights" in pursuance of the U.S. policy of confrontation.  
					
					 The West is being condemned by the world community for its racial discrimination, maltreatment of immigrants, violence against women and ill-treatment of prisoners and all other human rights abuses. Yet, it adopted UN "resolutions" on "human rights issues" of only some countries including the DPRK like a thief crying "Stop the thief!" This is the most striking example of the selectivity and double-standards in handling "human rights issues". 
					
					 The DPRK vehemently and totally rejects the recent "resolution" as it did in the past.
					
					 It will steadily strengthen and develop the Korean-style socialist system which fully protects the human rights and comprehensively promotes them.

articles.title: DPRK Government Economic Delegation Leaves for Vietnam
articles.content:
DPRK Government Economic Delegation Leaves for Vietnam
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- A DPRK government economic delegation headed by Ri Myong San, vice-minister of Foreign Trade, left here on Saturday to visit Vietnam.

articles.title: Vietnam Political Figure Praises Exploits of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Vietnam Political Figure Praises Exploits of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung devoted his all to the liberation of the country and its prosperity and the happiness of people.
					 Le Huu Nghia, member of the C.C., the Communist Party of Vietnam and president of the Ho Chi Minh National Academy of Politics and Public Administration who visited the DPRK, stressed this, expressing boundless reverence for Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He further said:
					
					 Kim Il Sung made great contributions to the foundation of the Workers' Party of Korea and its development.
					
					 He led the revolution and construction to victory in reliance on the strength of the people.
					
					 His life was a brilliant one of great man.
					
					 Visiting the International Friendship Exhibition House, we came to feel more deeply that the President is a great person.
					
					 He made the gifts, presented to him by party and state leaders and prominent personages of many countries, wealth of the people.
					
					 Indeed, he is the great leader of the people.
					
					 His revolutionary exploits will remain long.
					
					 He is a close friend of the Vietnamese people.
					
					 He, together with President Ho Chi Minh, provided the friendly relations between the DPRK and Vietnam.
					
					 He rendered unsparing support and encouragement to the Vietnamese people in the anti-U.S. resistance for national salvation and socialist construction.
					
					 The Vietnamese people will never forget it.
					
					The revolutionary cause of Kim Il Sung is being successfully carried forward to completion by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 We hope that the Korean people closely rallied around Kim Jong Il would achieve greater successes in the efforts to build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation true to the behests of the President.

articles.title: Gift from Chinese Delegation
articles.content:
Gift from Chinese Delegation
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the delegation of the Shanghai Institutes for International Studies on a visit to the DPRK.
					 The gift was handed to an official concerned by Yu Xintian, chairwoman of the Academic Committee of the Shanghai Institutes for International Studies who is leading the delegation, on Friday.

articles.title: DPRK Women Soccer Advances into Finals of Asian Games
articles.content:
DPRK Women Soccer Advances into Finals of Asian Games
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- The DPRK women's football team devastated its south Korean rival in semifinals of the 16th Asian Games held on Nov. 20.
					 The first goal came when No. 8 Jo Yun Mi made a strong middle- and long-distance kick from 22 meters before the rival's goal mouth at around the 45th minute of the first half.
					
					 As the DPRK team allowed its rival to score a goal before the end of the second half, it went into an extra-time game in ties. 
					
					 Amid the unceasing fierce attack of the DPRK team No. 2 Kim Kyong Hwa passed the ball to No. 11 Ra Un Sim who headed it into the rival's goal mouth at around the 3rd minute of its first half.
					
					 The third goal came when Ra Un Sim made a strong kick from 14 meters before the goal mouth at around the 13th minute of the second half after persistently threatening its rival by a surprise attack through a good combination of agile two-three person pass  and non-stopping pass.
					
					 The DPRK trounced its south Korean rival 3:1, advancing into finals.
					
					 Meanwhile, the DPRK women's volleyball team defeated its Japanese rival 3:0 in the group league matches of the 16th Asian Games held on Nov. 19.

articles.title: Thrice Honored Red Flag School
articles.content:
Thrice Honored Red Flag School 
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- Samhung Secondary School in Pyongyang is greeting its 65th anniversary.
					 It was named by President Kim Il Sung on November 22, Juche 34 (1945) after the liberation of the country from the Japanese colonial rule.
					
					 Samhung means bringing up able persons with a wide range of knowledge, noble morality and a strong physique and making the nation prosperous.
					
					 Talking to KCNA, Jong Mun Chon, principal of the school, introduced the history of the school.
					
					President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent to the school large quantities of teaching aids and educational materials several times and gave it instructions highly important in education and edification, he said, and went on:
					
					 The school is fully equipped with such educational facilities as library, computer room, foreign languages study room and laboratory.
					
					 It has steadily improved educational contents and methods as required by the developing situation and organized various after-school activities, including a do-good-thing movement, to produce many all-round persons.
					
					 The school has become a Thrice Honored Red Flag School and a model in training students to be knowledgeable, morally sound and physically strong.

articles.title: Joint Resolution on 20th Anniversary Pomminryon
articles.content:
Joint Resolution on 20th Anniversary Pomminryon 
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- The North, South and Overseas Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) Saturday made public a joint resolution on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of its formation.
					 Looking back with great pride and self-confidence on the path covered by Pomminryon over the past two decades on which it has taken the lead in putting spurs to the movement for independent reunification, the resolution expressed the unshakable will to continue advancing the June 15 era of independent reunification with fresh faith and determination as follows:
					
					 We will firmly preserve and thoroughly implement the historic inter-Korean joint declarations.
					
					 We will add more shine to the precious achievements made in the June 15 era and make positive efforts to put into practice all the provisions of the inter-Korean joint declarations and agreements on their implementation.
					
					 We will stir up the atmosphere of dialogue, reconciliation and cooperation for improving the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 Pomminryon will take the lead in the drive to promote and reenergize visits, contacts, multi-faceted dialogue and cooperation between the north and the south to implement the inter-Korean joint declarations.
					
					 For the present, we will make efforts in every aspect to make sure that the humanitarian cooperation undertakings and inter-Korean dialogue for the resumption of tour of Mt. Kumgang and Kaesong open a new phase in improving the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 We will make positive efforts to achieve widespread solidarity with all pro-reunification and patriotic forces at home and abroad and great unity of the nation.
					
					 We will stand against the anti-reunification forces' confrontation between systems and war moves and firmly defend the peace of the country.
					
					 Pomminryon will wage a resolute struggle against all traitorous, anti-reunification and anti-peace acts such as sparking off the confrontation between the systems in the north and the south and bringing a war despite the strong protest of all the fellow countrymen.
					
					 We will make positive efforts to drive the U.S. troops out of this land as they are persistently standing in the way of independent reunification of the Korean nation and inciting confrontation and war between the north and the south and build a lasting and solid peace-keeping mechanism.

articles.title: Patriotic Cause of Pomminryon Sure to Triumph
articles.content:
Patriotic Cause of Pomminryon Sure to Triumph 
Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- Papers Saturday dedicate signed articles to the 20th anniversary of the formation of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon).
					 Pomminryon was formed on Nov. 20, Juche 79 (1990) thanks to the positive support and encouragement of all the Koreans at home and abroad. It is a patriotic organization of the reunification movement whose mission is to achieve national reunification on the basis of the three principles -- independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity -- and which represents the will of all the Koreans in the north and the south and overseas for their unity and reunification. 
					
					 Rodong Sinmun says: The formation of Pomminryon helped the pro-reunification patriotic forces at home and abroad unite close under the banner of national reunification and the reunification movement which had been waged in the north and the south and overseas separately develop into a nationwide joint movement on an organized basis. 
					
					 Pomminryon has grown to be a reunification movement organization with a well-regulated organizational system such as regional headquarters and branches in all the places of the north and the south and overseas where Koreans live and a popular organization grouping Koreans from all walks of life. It has creditably performed its mission and role by dynamically organizing and mobilizing all the Koreans for the struggle for great national unity and national reunification under the uplifted banner of the three charters for national reunification and the five-point policy for great national unity.
					
					 It has energetically explained and disseminated the validity and vitality of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and the necessity to implement them and dynamically aroused all the Koreans at home and abroad to their implementation.
					
					 It has boosted solidarity among the north and south and overseas sides and stirred up the fellow countrymen's enthusiasm for reunification and made a great contribution to strengthening the driving force for national reunification through the reconciliation and unity of the nation.
					
					 Minju Joson stresses that the patriotic cause of Pomminryon dynamically advancing under the uplifted banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration amidst the positive support and encouragement of all the Koreans will surely be crowned with victory.

articles.title: Korean People Proud of Making Revolution under Guidance of Leader
articles.content:
Korean People Proud of Making Revolution under Guidance of Leader
Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- Korea of Songun and the great pride and self-confidence of the Korean people would be unthinkable without General Secretary Kim Jong Il, illustrious commander of Mt. Paektu without parallel in thinking, leadership and trait, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a signed article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is the pride and honor of the Korean people to have at their head the extraordinary thinker and theoretician who clearly indicates the path to be followed by the new century with his brilliant wisdom.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, with a clear insight into the changing circumstances of the Korean revolution and the trend of the international political situation, laid down the great Songun revolutionary line, a guideline for the Korean revolution, with President Kim Il Sung's idea of attaching importance to arms and his line giving priority to the military affairs as a starting point and basis in the crucible of the arduous revolution. This was a distinguished exploit of great historical significance in the revolutionary development in the era of independence.
					
					 It is the great honor and pride of the Korean people to hold in high esteem Kim Jong Il who has fully demonstrated the dignity and national power of the country with his great Songun politics.
					
					 He pursued the Songun politics in all fields with the fixed will that an army precisely means a revolution and a victory of socialism in the hard period when the country faced the grimmest ordeals. It was thanks to his Songun leadership that the army and people of the DPRK could lay solid foundations for building a thriving nation in all fields including politics, military affairs, economy and culture while turning adversity into favorable conditions in the worst ordeals.
					
					 It is the greatest fortune of the Korean people to hold in high esteem the great father of the nation who protects and takes care of all their destinies.
					
					 The history of the revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il is one of boundless loving care, trust and dedication to the people. It is his faith that a flower should be brought into bloom even on a rock and a star be picked from the sky if the people desire. The word people is brilliantly recorded in the indelible footsteps left by him in the protracted period since the outset of his revolutionary leadership.

articles.title: Human Rights Abuser Accused of Dodging His Resignation in S. Korea
articles.content:
Human Rights Abuser Accused of Dodging His Resignation in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- The Council of the Civic Human Rights Organization for Measures for the Resignation of Hyon Pyong Chol, chairman of the Human Rights Committee in south Korea, on Nov. 16 accused him of refusing to step down in disregard of the demand of the people from all walks of life. 
					 On the same day the organization recalled that Hyon expressed his stand of defying the people's demand for his resignation under various pretexts.
					
					 This is nothing but a poor excuse, it said, terming as a sheer nonsense his assertion that he had no responsibility for the recent situation surrounding the Human Rights Committee as it was created by a third person.
					
					 The organization held that the chairman of the committee should own due responsibility by stepping down in the light of the reality today when its members are tendering their resignations one after another in protest against his behavior.

articles.title: Settlement of Japan's Crimes Related to Sexual Slavery Urged
articles.content:
Settlement of Japan's Crimes Related to Sexual Slavery Urged
						
Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps in south Korea held a Wednesday rally in Seoul demanding the settlement of the issue of "comfort women" for the Imperial Japanese Army, according to south Korean CBS.
					Speakers at the rally accused the Japanese government of persistently shunning the just voice and demand of the "comfort women" survivors.
					
					The Japanese authorities should redeem the past crimes related to the sexual slavery at an early date and make due apology and reparation for them, they urged.

articles.title: Tuition Waiver Program to Korean Schools Demanded in Seoul
articles.content:
Tuition Waiver Program to Korean Schools Demanded in Seoul
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- Women's organizations of south Korea including the Women's Solidarity, the Federation of Women Organizations and the Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers' Corps called a press conference in Seoul on Nov. 17 urging the Japanese authorities to immediately apply the tuition waiver program to Korean schools in Japan.
					 At the conference speakers recalled that the Japanese authorities raised the use of Japanese textbooks, etc. as a precondition for applying the said program to Korean schools.
					
					 This is a despicable act of forcing the Korean schools to teach the students the distorted history of Japan that "Tok Islets belong to Japan," they stated, and continued: 
					
					 Japan has been hell-bent on unreasonable prejudice and discriminations, far from specially treating the Korean students, the descendants of the compatriots who were forced to do slave labor after being drafted by the Japanese imperialists in the past.
					
					 They urged the Japanese authorities to roll back at once their discriminating policy regarding the education at the Korean schools and apply the above-said program to them without condition.
					
					 At the end of the press conference the organizations handed a written protest to the Japanese embassy.

articles.title: DPRK's Determination to Build Thriving Nation Lauded
articles.content:
DPRK's Determination to Build Thriving Nation Lauded
Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism brought out the 48th issue of its bulletin titled "The DPRK can do anything when it is determined," carrying a photo of General Secretary Kim Jong Il giving field guidance to the reclamation site of the Taegyedo Tideland.
					The bulletin said in an article that this year the DPRK announced the completion of the project for reclaiming the above-said tideland covering 8,800 hectares, adding that it was another event as it proved once again before the international community that the DPRK can surely do anything when it is determined.
					
					 The path covered by the DPRK can be described as a history in which it has unconditionally put into practice whatever it once determined to do, the bulletin noted, and went on:
					
					 This is evidenced by the fact that when everything in the northern half of Korea was reduced to debris after the war, the U.S. bragged it would not be able to stand on its own feet even in 100 years, but it completed its postwar rehabilitation in a short span of time, carried out the historic task for industrialization in a matter of 14 years and built the West Sea Barrage regarded as a world miracle in a matter of five years in the 1980s by damming off the rough sea extending 8 kilometers.
					
					 The same can be said of the recently reclaimed Taegyedo Tideland.
					
					 The completion of the project for reclaiming the above-said tideland in the DPRK in the wake of its development of the CNC technology of its own style, the perfection of the Juche iron production system and the successes made in mass-producing vinalon and fertilizers made the world keenly realize that the DPRK's determination to build a thriving nation in the near future is by no means an empty talk and it is being translated into a reality, stressed the bulletin.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il felicita a los participantes en Conferencia de FPIC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il felicita a los participantes en Conferencia de FPIC
Pyongyang, 20 de noviembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del  Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, se reunio con los participantes en la Conferencia de Activistas de las Fuerzas Populares del Interior de Corea (FPIC) y los felicito.
					   Cuando el Dirigente aparecio en el lugar habilitado para fotografiar, todos los participantes le dieron calida bienvenida.
					
					  El Dirigente felicito calurosamente a los participantes en la conferencia quienes con la infinita fidelidad al partido y al lider y el espiritu de servicio abnegado al pueblo, vienen defendiendo firmemente en la primera linea de lucha clasista las conquistas de la revolucion coreana alcanzadas con sangre y la vida y bienes del pueblo, y se fotografio junto a ellos.
					
					  Senalo que nuestra patria socialista del Juche se convirtio en una fortaleza inexpugnable porque el heroico Ejercito Popular de Corea, formado como filas invencibles capaces del combate uno versus cien enemigos, defienden firmemente el frente de la patria y las Fuerzas Populares del Interior, infinitamente fieles al partido y el lider, la patria y el pueblo, salvaguardan fidedignamente la seguridad del pais y el pueblo.
					
					  Y evaluo altamente los meritos de los militares de las FPIC que durante mas de 60 anos, cumplieron excelentemente su honrosa mision como unidad en la primera linea de defensa a ultranza al lider y como tropas interiores del partido.
					
					  El Dirigente expreso la gran esperanza y seguridad de que en el futuro tambien, ellos cumpliran perfectamente su deber como ejecutores y defensores de la ley, bien conscientes de su mision importante y responsable de defensor politico de nuestro partido, y defenderan asi con vida el regimen socialista al estilo coreano centrado en las masas populares.  
					
					Estuvieron presentes en esta ocasion Ri Yong Ho, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico (BP) del CC del PTC, vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central del PTC y jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, Kim Jong Un, vicepresidente de la CMC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam y Choe Thae Bok, miembros del BP y secretarios del CC del PTC, Yang Hyong Sop, miembro del BP del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, Ju Sang Song, miembro del BP del CC del PTC y ministro de Seguridad del Pueblo, Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del CDN, y Ri Pyong Sam, jefe de la Direccion Politica de las FPIC.

articles.title: MINREX rechaza nueva "resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC
articles.content:
MINREX rechaza nueva "resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 20 de noviembre (ATCC) -- En entrevista exclusiva con la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea concedida este sabado en relacion con la "resolucion de Derechos Humanos" anti- Republica Popular Democratica de Corea aprobada en el Tercer Comite del 65o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio la siguiente respuesta:
					  Este ano tambien, la Union Europea (UE) y Japon volvieron a aprobar de manera coercitiva la "resolucion" inventada con datos falsificados.
					
					  Esta "resolucion" deviene el producto del complot politico de las fuerzas hostiles enajenadas de la defensa y fomento de los derechos humanos.
					
					  Las fuerzas hostiles acaudilladas por EE.UU. recurren cada ano a tal complot con el objetivo de derrumbar con la presion e intrigas el regimen de la RPDC tildandola de "pais violador de DDHH".
					
					  El ano 2003, en que se inicio la aprobacion de "resolucion" de ese tipo, fue cuando la administracion Bush de EE.UU. entro en el enfrentamiento total con la RPDC echando por tierra el Acuerdo Basico RPDC-EE.UU.
					
					  La UE, que venia sosteniendo conversaciones con la RPDC sobre los DDHH, se convirtio de repente en el "proponente del proyecto de resolucion de DDHH" contra ella sumandose a la politica conflictiva de EE.UU. Esto es un buen ejemplo de la politizacion de ese tema.
					
					  El Occidente es condenado por el mundo por sus criminales actos en violacion de DDHH, inclusive la discriminacion racial, el acoso a emigrantes, las acciones violentas contra la mujer y el maltrato a los reos.
					
					Sin embargo, partiendo de su logica de bandido, aprobo como "resolucion" de la ONU solo el "problema de DDHH" de unos paises incluyendo la RPDC, lo cual es el climax de la selectividad y la pauta de doble rasero en el trato de este tema. 
					
					  Como de siempre, la RPDC rechaza categoricamente la presente "resolucion". 
					
					  La RPDC seguira fortaleciendo el regimen socialista al estilo coreano donde los DDHH se defienden con mas firmeza y pueden ser fomentados en todos los aspectos.

articles.title: Personalidad vietnamita alaba hazanas de Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Personalidad vietnamita alaba hazanas de Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, 20 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Durante su estancia en Corea, Le Huu Nghia, miembro del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Vietnam y director de la Academia Nacional de Politica y Administracion Publica Ho Chi Minh, expreso su gran respeto al Presidente Kim Il Sung como sigue:
					El Presidente dedico todo lo suyo al cumplimiento de la causa de liberacion y prosperidad del pais y la felicidad del pueblo.
					
					El hizo enorme contribucion a la fundacion y al desarrollo del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					Dirigio a la victoria la revolucion y la construccion apoyandose en las fuerzas del pueblo.
					
					Toda su vida constituye la brillante de un gran hombre.
					
					Visitando la Exposicion Permanente de Amistad Internacional, sentimos profundamente la noble personalidad del Presidente.
					
					El Presidente convirtio los regalos recibidos de los jefes de partido y Estado y las personalidades renombradas de numerosos paises del mundo en los patrimonios comunes del pueblo.
					
					El es gran lider del pueblo y amigo entranable del pueblo vietnamita.
					
					Seran eternas sus hazanas revolucionarias.
					
					El Presidente establecio junto con su homologo Ho Chi Minh las relaciones de amistad entre ambos paises.
					
					Ademas envio ilimitado apoyo y respaldo a la lucha antiyanqui por la salvacion nacional y la construccion socialista del pueblo vietnamita.
					
					El pueblo de Vietnam nunca lo olvidara.
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il continua y lleva a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Presidente    Kim Il Sung.
					
					Deseo que el pueblo coreano, unido firmemente en torno al Dirigente en acato al legado del Presidente, logre mayores exitos en la construccion de la gran potencia prospera socialista.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe presente de delegacion china
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe presente de delegacion china
Pyongyang, 20 de noviembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio regalo que le dirigiera la delegacion del Instituto de Asuntos Internacionales de Shanghai, de visita en Corea.
					El presente fue entregado el dia 19 a un funcionario coreano por la presidenta del comite academico de ese instituto, Yu Xintian, quien preside la delegacion.

articles.title: Publicada resolucion conjunta en homenaje al 20o aniversario de APRP
articles.content:
Publicada resolucion conjunta en homenaje al 20o aniversario de APRP
Pyongyang, 20 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Las Direcciones del Norte, el Sur y Ultramar de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria (APRP) hicieron publica el dia 20 la resolucion conjunta en ocasion del XX aniversario de fundacion de su entidad.
					  La nota recuerda con gran orgullo y dignidad la trayectoria de 20 anos pasados de la APRP que impulso a la cabeza el movimiento por la reunificacion independiente de la nacion coreana, y expone la firme voluntad de seguir llevando adelante con la fe y decision renovadas la epoca de reunificacion independiente del 15 de Junio.
					
					  El texto resumido del documento sigue:
					
					  La APRP mantendra y ejecutara cabalmente las historicas declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur.
					
					  Se esforzara activamente por glorificar los preciosos exitos alcanzados en la epoca del 15 de Junio y llevar a la practica todos los articulos de declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur y los acuerdos para su ejecucion.
					
					  Promovera el ambiente de dialogo, reconciliacion y cooperacion con vistas a mejorar las relaciones Norte-Sur.
					
					  Se esforzara en la delantera por promover y dinamizar el viaje reciproco, el contacto, el dialogo y la colaboracion multilaterales entre el Norte y el Sur en direccion a la implementacion de las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur.
					
					  Por ahora, trabajara en todos los sentidos para dar la nueva coyuntura para el mejoramiento de relaciones N-S mediante el dialogo intercoreano sobre las labores de cooperacion humanitaria y la reanudacion del turismo en el monte Kumgang y Kaesong.
					
					  Hara todo lo posible para lograr amplia solidaridad con todas las fuerzas patrioticas pro-reunificacion en el interior y exterior del pais y la gran unidad nacional.
					
					  Se opondra a las maniobras de fuerzas anti-reunificacion en busca de enfrentamiento de regimenes y guerra y defendera firmemente la paz del pais.
					
					  La APRP luchara firmemente contra todos los actos antinacionales, anti-reunificacion y anti-paz que acarrean la confrontacion de sistemas y la guerra entre el Norte y el Sur pese a la fuerte condena de todos los coreanos.
					
					  Hara ingentes esfuerzos por retirar del territorio patrio a las tropas yanquis, que impiden a toda costa la reunificacion independiente de la nacion coreana y azuzan la confrontacion y la guerra entre el Norte y el Sur, y por establecer el sistema de paz duradera y solida.
